name: PDF_Document_Annotation
description: Schema for annotating PDF documents with important information

fields.name: document_type
fields.label: Document Type
fields.description: The type of the document (e.g., PDF)

fields.name: size
fields.label: Size
fields.description: The size of the document in bytes

fields.name: path
fields.label: Path
fields.description: The path where the document is located

fields.name: official_address
fields.label: Official Address
fields.description: The official address of the organization or institution mentioned in the document

fields.name: document_url
fields.label: Document URL
fields.description: The URL where the document can be found (if provided)

fields.name: contact_email
fields.label: Contact Email
fields.description: The email address provided for contacting the organization or institution

fields.name: contact_phone
fields.label: Contact Phone
fields.description: The phone number provided for contacting the organization or institution

fields.name: copyright_years
fields.label: Copyright Years
fields.description: The years mentioned in the copyright statement

fields.name: document_version
fields.label: Document Version
fields.description: The version of the document mentioned (e.g., Rev.45)

fields.name: document_number
fields.label: Document Number
fields.description: Any document number mentioned in the text (e.g., EMA/37991/2019)

fields.name: document_title
fields.label: Document Title
fields.description: The title of the document if explicitly stated

fields.name: subject_area
fields.label: Subject Area
fields.description: The subject area or topic covered by the document
